name: Hextech Gunblade
simpleDescription: Increases Attack Damage and Ability Power, activate to slow a target

active.name: Lightning Bolt
active.effects: Shocks the target enemy champion with a bolt of lightning, dealing {{as|{{pp|175 + (253-175)/17*(x-1) for 20}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 25% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
